body:
That's odd. #864 was filed at 2:46PM, before this PR was merged (4:26pm PST). Also, #864 was on the redesign branch, which this feature shouldn't affect. I also don't see any evidence of an automatic code-owner review request on #864, but maybe Github did something weird.

I think that actually happened was that I initially asked for review from the normandy-comitters team, which you are a part of. @Osmose pointed out that is probably not ideal since it casts too wide a net. I later changed it to request review from the normandy-owners team.

I'd like to keep this feature on for now, but if you get any more spurious notifications, we can roll it back.
